title: What is the level of math classes in college? - Quora

response.answer_text: You’ll find everything from remedial classes that cover basic adding and subtracting all the way up through higher level classes like topology or advanced calculus. If you’re really asking what math classes you’ll have to face in college, that will depend on your major. If you intend to study a STEM-related field, you may end up taking 2 or 3 semesters of calculus or more. If you study something in the arts or social sciences, you’ll probably only be required to take college algebra, which is like a fast-paced review of your high school Algebra II and Trig/Pre-Calc class. Hope this helps!
